ISSUE.TITLE: enhancement: inconsistent views with Long Text columns with line break
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Long text is not consistent in the grid view and in edit view. The API is fine though. See screenshots for better understanding. **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a column with Long text type 2. Input two paragraph, separated by a new line 3. Save 4. In grid view, it combines as a long paragraph 5. In edit view, it shows two paragraphs as expected **Expected behavior** Both view should be consistent.
